title: First Flight
objective: Make the drone take off and land safely.

hints.message: The drone needs to take off first! Try: drone.takeoff()

title: Forward Motion
objective: Move forward 2 meters and return to start.

title: Climb & Descend
objective: Climb to 3 meters, move forward, then descend and land.

hints.message: Try increasing the altitude with drone.move_up(<meters>)

title: Square Pattern
objective: Fly a 2m × 2m square and return to start.
starterCode:
drone.takeoff()
// Use move_forward and move_right to form a square
drone.move_forward(2)
drone.move_right(2)
drone.move_backward(2)
drone.move_left(2)
drone.land()

hints.message: Mission area is 10m x 10m — keep movements small.

title: Precision Hover
objective: Ascend to 2 meters, hold position, then land precisely.
starterCode:
drone.takeoff()
drone.move_up(2)
// hold for a few seconds in simulation
drone.land()

hints.message: Don't forget to land the drone! Add drone.land() at the end.

title: Back To Base
objective: Move forward then return using move_backward and land safely.

hints.message: Use drone.move_backward() to return to start.

title: Precision Landing
objective: Land within 0.5m of the start position after a short flight.
starterCode:
drone.takeoff()
drone.move_forward(1)
drone.move_right(1)
drone.move_left(1)
drone.move_backward(1)
drone.land()

hints.message: Try returning along the same path for best accuracy.

title: Figure Eight
objective: Combine lateral and forward movements to trace a figure‑eight pattern.
starterCode:
drone.takeoff()
drone.move_forward(2)
drone.move_right(1)
drone.move_backward(2)
drone.move_left(1)
drone.land()

hints.message: Break the pattern into small steps and test often.

title: Altitude Control
objective: Practice ascending and descending smoothly between heights.

hints.message: Check units: distances are in meters (e.g. 1.5).

title: Timed Run
objective: Complete a short course within 20 seconds.

hints.message: Try minimizing pauses and redundant moves to finish faster.
